decl:
/-- A cochain complex that is both strictly `â‰¤ n` and `â‰¥ n` is isomorphic to
a complex `(single _ _ n).obj M` for some object `M`. -/
lemma exists_iso_single [HasZeroObject C] (n : â„¤) [K.IsStrictlyGE n] [K.IsStrictlyLE n] :
    âˆƒ (M : C), Nonempty (K â‰… (single _ _ n).obj M) :=
  âŸ¨K.X n, âŸ¨{
      hom := mkHomToSingle (ğŸ™ _) (fun i (hi : i + 1 = n) â†¦
        (K.isZero_of_isStrictlyGE n i (by omega)).eq_of_src _ _)
      inv := mkHomFromSingle (ğŸ™ _) (fun i (hi : n + 1 = i) â†¦
        (K.isZero_of_isStrictlyLE n i (by omega)).eq_of_tgt _ _)
      hom_inv_id := by

        Â· apply (K.isZero_of_isStrictlyGE n i (by omega)).eq_of_src
        Â· simp
        Â· apply (K.isZero_of_isStrictlyLE n i (by omega)).eq_of_tgt
      inv_hom_id := by aesop }âŸ©âŸ©
